content: Are you using a VPN? The SMTP server could behave differently depending on the IP address your VPN makes you seem to have. If that's the case, check whether your VPN has an option called split tunneling which would allow you to let Thunderbird bypass the VPN.
creator: DavidGG

content:
Not sure what you mean. Is it that sending works, but then you cannot see a copy of the sent message in Thunderbird? This would have nothing to do with your SMTP settings. If you can successfully send, then the outgoing (SMTP) settings are correct.

What type of mail account is this (POP/IMAP)? If you set up the account as POP, Thunderbird may save a local copy of the messages you send with Thunderbird, but has no access to any sent messages stored on the server…
creator: DavidGG

content:
Username and password isn't used to authenticate with Gmail accounts. You have to use OAuth2, as described here:

https://support.mozilla.org/kb/automatic-conversion-google-mail-accounts-oauth20
creator: DavidGG

content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content:
1. Thunderbird 128.7.0esr (64 bit) 2. Windows 11 Home 23H2 Biuld 22631.4830 3. Provider: Gmail 4. Tipo di Account: IMAP 5. Estensioni installate:

6. Messaggi Errore: nessuno 7. Software di sicurezza: BITDEFENDER TOTAL SECURITY Build 27.0.47.237
creator: stefano.ferrecchi

content:
You appear to have incorrectly configured the outgoing (SMTP) server settings. The error message is telling you that you must use STARTTLS, which you're apparently not doing.

Which is you email provider? Post a screenshot of your outgoing (SMTP) server settings.
creator: DavidGG

content:
svhermann84 said
Hallo alle, seit heute Früh können wir keine Email mehr empfangen. Kurz vor acht kam die letzte und kurze Zeit später kam keine mehr an. Dies sollte eigentlich so sein, da wir aus unserem Buchungsprogramm immer eine Kopie bekommen. Auch jetzt später im Selbstversuch kommen keine Mails an. Versenden ist problemlos möglich, jedoch können diese dann nicht im Ordner Gesendet kopiert werden. Wir haben zwei Mailkonten. Einmal über 1blu und einmal Jimdo und natürlich in dieser Zeit keine veränderungen vorgenommen. Vielleicht kann jemand helfen was das Problem sein könnte.

Kleiner Nachtrag. Anscheinend funktioniert es auf meinem Laptop(Windows 7) nicht aber auf einem anderen PC(Windows 11) schon. Gibt es trotzdem ne Lösung?
creator: svhermann84

content: Someone more familiar with this kind of issues may be able to better assist, but a certain possibility is that your entire mail folder contents were deleted by the antivirus as a result of it deleting the infected file that Thunderbird was using to store the mail for that folder…
creator: DavidGG
